          <title>
            <string language="ca">Calculadora</string>
            <string language="en">Calculator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calculatrice</string>

          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Eina virtual que simula una calculadora i permet dur a terme operacions aritmètiques de forma ràpida.</string>
            <string language="en">Virtual instrument simulating a calculator that can be used for quick arithmetic operations.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Virtuelles Instrument, das einen Rechner 
simuliert, der für schnelle arithmetische Operationen benutzt werden 
kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instrument virtuel simulant une calculatrice qui

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrumento virtual que simula uma calculadora

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strumento virtuale che simula un calcolatore che 
può essere utilizzato per i funzionamenti aritmetici rapidi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικονικό όργανο που μιμείται έναν υπολογιστή που 
μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για τις γρήγορες αριθμητικές 
διαδικασίες.</string>
          </description>
